Hi Ron,

Hmmm...  I'd heard that even touching iron tsuba wasn't such a good 
idea due to this leaving oils which would eventually invite red 
rust...but maybe this isn't the case(?)...  It's rather surprising 
to think that there is such a variety of opinion on this issue!  
Thanks for the input!

Steve
